title: ASAN Agency
author: ASAN Agency
created_time: July 25, 2022, 07:58:54 AMLast edit: July 28, 2022, 08:12:10 AM by ASAN Agency
content: ■ How to apply1. Install the ASAN Wallet Google app or access the web version.2. Sign up for ASAN Wallet.3. Complete the application form.https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1W8lDmwH4UcI-ln5gLGvn9YI93LZ44a0ZlDjq_XnLxfU/edit4. Please tell the Telegram room that you have completed the application form.https://t.me/ASANToken■ ASAN WALLET   Google APP - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.asan.wallet   Web - https://wallet.asanverse.io/■ Points to Note1. This event is limited to one application per person.2. If duplicate wins (n times per person) are confirmed after the announcement of the winner, the win may be canceled.3. If the event applicant's ASAN wallet account is created illegally or abnormally, the application acceptance/winning may be canceled.4. ASAN VERSEL LTD. and Asan Art Culture Co., Ltd. are not responsible for the disadvantages of applicants due to unfamiliarity with the contents of the event.■ ASAN Token in social media- Twitter : https://twitter.com/AsanVerse- Telegram : https://t.me/ASANToken- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/asanverse/- Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/asanverse/- Kakao : https://open.kakao.com/o/g06kB27d  (CODE - asan88)- Whitpaper : https://www.asanverse.io/_files/ugd/97e0bd_1bf83eb9fd8943d8803ea0a13df70f9e.pdf- WebSite : https://www.asanverse.io/
